summary.span: 表示根据键的哈希代码进行组织的键/值对的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of key/value pairs that are organized based on the hash code of the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个元素都是存储在对象中的键/值对 。Each element is a key/value pair stored in a object. 键不能为 `null` ，但值可以为。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不建议使用 `Hashtable` 类进行新的开发。We don't recommend that you use the `Hashtable` class for new development. 相反，我们建议使用泛型 类。Instead, we recommend that you use the generic class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 GitHub 上 [不应使用非泛型集合](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md) 。For more information, see [Non-generic collections shouldn't be used](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md) on GitHub. 用作键的对象 需要重写 方法 (或 接口) 和 方法 (或 接口) 。The objects used as keys by a are required to override the method (or the interface) and the method (or the interface). 方法和接口的实现必须以相同的方式处理区分大小写。否则， 可能行为不正确。The implementation of both methods and interfaces must handle case sensitivity the same way; otherwise, the might behave incorrectly. 例如，在创建时 ，必须使用类 (或 ) 与 类 (或任何不区分大小写的实现) 一起使用 。For example, when creating a , you must use the class (or any case-insensitive implementation) with the class (or any case-insensitive implementation). 此外，当在中存在键时，这些方法必须生成相同的结果 。Furthermore, these methods must produce the same results when called with the same parameters while the key exists in the . 一种替代方法是使用 具有参数的构造函数 。An alternative is to use a constructor with an parameter. 如果键相等性只是引用相等性，则的继承实现 就足够了。If key equality were simply reference equality, the inherited implementation of and would suffice. 关键对象在中用作键时，它们必须是不可变的 。Key objects must be immutable as long as they are used as keys in the . 向添加元素时 ，会根据密钥的哈希代码将元素放入存储桶中。When an element is added to the , the element is placed into a bucket based on the hash code of the key. 键的后续查找使用密钥的哈希代码仅在一个特定存储桶中搜索，从而大大减少了查找元素所需的键比较次数。Subsequent lookups of the key use the hash code of the key to search in only one particular bucket, thus substantially reducing the number of key comparisons required to find an element. 的加载因子确定了 元素与存储桶的最大比率。The load factor of a determines the maximum ratio of elements to buckets. 较小的负载因素将导致平均查找时间更快，同时增加了内存消耗。Smaller load factors cause faster average lookup times at the cost of increased memory consumption. 默认的负载系数1.0 通常提供速度和大小之间的最佳平衡。The default load factor of 1.0 generally provides the best balance between speed and size. 创建时，还可以指定不同的负载系数 。A different load factor can also be specified when the is created. 当向添加元素时 ，的实际加载因子将 增加。As elements are added to a , the actual load factor of the increases. 当实际加载因子达到指定的负载因子时，中的存储桶数 将自动增加到大于当前 bucket 数两倍的最小质数 。When the actual load factor reaches the specified load factor, the number of buckets in the is automatically increased to the smallest prime number that is larger than twice the current number of buckets. 中的每个密钥对象 必须提供自己的哈希函数，可通过调用访问该函数 。Each key object in the must provide its own hash function, which can be accessed by calling . 但是， 可以将实现的任何对象传递给 构造函数，并且该哈希函数用于表中的所有对象。However, any object implementing can be passed to a constructor, and that hash function is used for all objects in the table. 的容量 是可容纳的元素数 。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 向添加元素时，会 根据需要通过重新分配来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. **仅 .NET Framework：** 对于非常大的 对象，可以通过 `enabled` [``](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element) `true` 在运行时环境中将配置元素的属性设置为，来将64位系统上的最大容量增加到2000000000个元素。**.NET Framework only:** For very large objects, you can increase the maximum capacity to 2 billion elements on a 64-bit system by setting the `enabled` attribute of the [``](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element) configuration element to `true` in the run-time environment. `foreach`C # 语言 `For Each` 中 (Visual Basic) 的语句返回集合中元素的类型的对象。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`For Each` in Visual Basic) returns an object of the type of the elements in the collection. 由于的每个元素 都是键/值对，因此元素类型不是键的类型或值的类型。Since each element of the is a key/value pair, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 相反，元素类型为 。Instead, the element type is . 例如：For example: [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample#01](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample/cpp/remarks.cpp#01)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample/cs/remarks.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample/vb/remarks.vb#01)] `foreach`语句是枚举器周围的包装器，它仅允许从集合读取，而不是写入到集合中。The `foreach` statement is a wrapper around the enumerator, which only allows reading from, not writing to, the collection. 由于序列化和反序列化的枚举器 可能导致元素重新排序，因此不能在不调用方法的情况下继续枚举 。Because serializing and deserializing an enumerator for a can cause the elements to become reordered, it is not possible to continue enumeration without calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 因为键可以被继承并且其行为发生了更改，所以使用方法进行的比较无法保证其绝对唯一性 。Because keys can be inherited and their behavior changed, their absolute uniqueness cannot be guaranteed by comparisons using the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建、初始化和执行各种函数到， 以及如何打印出其键和值。The following example shows how to create, initialize and perform various functions to a and how to print out its keys and values. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample#00](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample/cpp/hashtable_example.cpp#00)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample/cs/hashtable_example.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample/vb/hashtable_example.vb#00)] [!code-powershell[System.Collections.Hashtable_ClassExample#00](~/samples/snippets/powershell/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.hashtable.class/ps/hashtable.ps1#00)]

threadsafe.span: 是线程安全的，可供多个读取器线程和单个写入线程使用。

span.span: is thread safe for use by multiple reader threads and a single writing thread.

threadsafe.span: 当只有一个线程执行写入 (更新) 操作时，它对于多线程使用是线程安全的，因此，如果编写器已序列化为，则允许锁定读取 。

span.span: It is thread safe for multi-thread use when only one of the threads perform write (update) operations, which allows for lock-free reads provided that the writers are serialized to the .

threadsafe.span: 若要支持多个编写器，对的所有操作都 必须通过方法返回的包装完成 ，前提是没有任何线程读取 对象。

span.span: To support multiple writers all operations on the must be done through the wrapper returned by the method, provided that there are no threads reading the object.

threadsafe.span: 枚举集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

summary.span: 使用默认的初始容量、加载因子、哈希代码提供程序和比较器来初始化 类的新的空实例。

span.span: Initializes a new, empty instance of the class using the default initial capacity, load factor, hash code provider, and comparer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 哈希表的容量用于根据加载因子计算哈希表存储桶的最佳数量。A hash table's capacity is used to calculate the optimal number of hash table buckets based on the load factor. 容量会根据需要自动增加。Capacity is automatically increased as required. 加载因子是元素与存储桶的最大比率。The load factor is the maximum ratio of elements to buckets. 较小的负载系数意味着更快的查找，但代价是增加了内存消耗。A smaller load factor means faster lookup at the cost of increased memory consumption. 当实际加载因子达到指定的负载因子时，存储桶的数量会自动增加到大于当前 bucket 数两倍的最小质数。When the actual load factor reaches the specified load factor, the number of buckets is automatically increased to the smallest prime number that is larger than twice the current number of buckets. 哈希代码提供程序密密麻麻对象中的键的哈希代码 。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the object. 默认哈希代码提供程序是键的实现 。The default hash code provider is the key's implementation of . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 中的每个键都 必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 默认比较器是键的实现 。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 此构造函数是一种 `O(1)` 操作。This constructor is an `O(1)` operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建使用不同构造函数的哈希表 ，并演示哈希表行为中的差异，即使每个表包含相同的元素也是如此。The following code example creates hash tables using different constructors and demonstrates the differences in the behavior of the hash tables, even if each one contains the same elements. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ctor/CPP/hashtable_ctor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ctor/CS/hashtable_ctor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Hashtable_ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ctor/VB/hashtable_ctor.vb#1)]

span.span: The new object has an initial capacity equal to the number of elements copied, and uses the default load factor, hash code provider, and comparer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始容量设置为源字典中的元素数。The initial capacity is set to the number of elements in the source dictionary. 根据负载因素，容量根据需要自动增加。Capacity is automatically increased as required based on the load factor. 加载因子是元素与存储桶的最大比率。The load factor is the maximum ratio of elements to buckets. 较小的负载系数意味着更快的查找，但代价是增加了内存消耗。A smaller load factor means faster lookup at the cost of increased memory consumption. 当实际加载因子达到指定的负载因子时，存储桶的数量会自动增加到大于当前 bucket 数两倍的最小质数。When the actual load factor reaches the specified load factor, the number of buckets is automatically increased to the smallest prime number that is larger than twice the current number of buckets. 哈希代码提供程序密密麻麻对象中的键的哈希代码 。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the object. 默认哈希代码提供程序是键的实现 。The default hash code provider is the key's implementation of . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 中的每个键都 必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 默认比较器是键的实现 。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 新的元素 按枚举器循环访问对象的相同顺序进行排序 。The elements of the new are sorted in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the object. 此构造函数是一个 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是参数中的元素数目 `d` 。This constructor is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is the number of elements in the `d` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建使用不同构造函数的哈希表 ，并演示哈希表行为中的差异，即使每个表包含相同的元素也是如此。The following code example creates hash tables using different constructors and demonstrates the differences in the behavior of the hash tables, even if each one contains the same elements. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ctorDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ctorDictionary/CPP/hashtable_ctordictionary.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ctorDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ctorDictionary/CS/hashtable_ctordictionary.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Hashtable_ctorDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ctorDictionary/VB/hashtable_ctordictionary.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始容量设置为源字典中的元素数。The initial capacity is set to the number of elements in the source dictionary. 根据负载因素，容量根据需要自动增加。Capacity is automatically increased as required based on the load factor. 加载因子是元素与存储桶的最大比率。The load factor is the maximum ratio of elements to buckets. 较小的负载系数意味着更快的查找，但代价是增加了内存消耗。A smaller load factor means faster lookup at the cost of increased memory consumption. 当实际加载因子达到指定的负载因子时，存储桶的数量会自动增加到大于当前 bucket 数两倍的最小质数。When the actual load factor reaches the specified load factor, the number of buckets is automatically increased to the smallest prime number that is larger than twice the current number of buckets. 对象同时包含哈希代码提供程序和比较器。The object includes both the hash code provider and the comparer. 如果 在构造函数中使用 ，则在对象中用作键的对象 不需要重写 和 方法。If an is used in the constructor, the objects used as keys in the object are not required to override the and methods. 哈希代码提供程序密密麻麻中的键的哈希代码 。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 默认哈希代码提供程序是键的实现 。The default hash code provider is the key's implementation of . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 中的每个键都 必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 默认比较器是键的实现 。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 启用各种方案，如执行不区分大小写的字符串查找。The enables scenarios such as doing lookups with case-insensitive strings. 新的元素 按枚举器循环访问对象的相同顺序进行排序 。The elements of the new are sorted in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the object. 此构造函数是一个 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是参数中的元素数目 `d` 。This constructor is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is the number of elements in the `d` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建使用不同构造函数的哈希表 ，并演示哈希表行为中的差异，即使每个表包含相同的元素也是如此。The following code example creates hash tables using different constructors and demonstrates the differences in the behavior of the hash tables, even if each one contains the same elements. remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始容量设置为源字典中的元素数。The initial capacity is set to the number of elements in the source dictionary. 根据负载因素，容量根据需要自动增加。Capacity is automatically increased as required based on the load factor. 加载因子是元素与存储桶的最大比率。The load factor is the maximum ratio of elements to buckets. 较小的负载系数意味着更快的查找，但代价是增加了内存消耗。A smaller load factor means faster lookup at the cost of increased memory consumption. 当实际加载因子达到指定的负载因子时，存储桶的数量会自动增加到大于当前 bucket 数两倍的最小质数。When the actual load factor reaches the specified load factor, the number of buckets is automatically increased to the smallest prime number that is larger than twice the current number of buckets. 哈希代码提供程序密密麻麻对象中的键的哈希代码 。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the object. 默认哈希代码提供程序是键的实现 。The default hash code provider is the key's implementation of . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 中的每个键都 必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 默认比较器是键的实现 。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 自定义哈希代码提供程序和自定义比较器启用使用不区分大小写的字符串进行查找等情况。The custom hash code provider and the custom comparer enable scenarios such as doing lookups with case-insensitive strings. 新的元素 按枚举器循环访问对象的相同顺序进行排序 。The elements of the new are sorted in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the object. 此构造函数是一个 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是参数中的元素数目 `d` 。This constructor is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is the number of elements in the `d` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建使用不同构造函数的哈希表 ，并演示哈希表行为中的差异，即使每个表包含相同的元素也是如此。The following code example creates hash tables using different constructors and demonstrates the differences in the behavior of the hash tables, even if each one contains the same elements. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ctorDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ctorDictionary/CPP/hashtable_ctordictionary.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ctorDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ctorDictionary/CS/hashtable_ctordictionary.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Hashtable_ctorDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ctorDictionary/VB/hashtable_ctordictionary.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过指定初始容量，无需在向对象添加元素时执行多个大小调整操作 。Specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the object. 根据负载因素，容量根据需要自动增加。Capacity is automatically increased as required based on the load factor. 加载因子是元素与存储桶的最大比率。The load factor is the maximum ratio of elements to buckets. 较小的负载系数意味着更快的查找，但代价是增加了内存消耗。A smaller load factor means faster lookup at the cost of increased memory consumption. 当实际加载因子达到指定的负载因子时，存储桶的数量会自动增加到大于当前 bucket 数两倍的最小质数。When the actual load factor reaches the specified load factor, the number of buckets is automatically increased to the smallest prime number that is larger than twice the current number of buckets. 哈希代码提供程序密密麻麻中的键的哈希代码 。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 默认哈希代码提供程序是键的实现 。The default hash code provider is the key's implementation of . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 中的每个键都 必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 默认比较器是键的实现 。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 自定义哈希代码提供程序和自定义比较器启用使用不区分大小写的字符串进行查找等情况。The custom hash code provider and the custom comparer enable scenarios such as doing lookups with case-insensitive strings. 此构造函数是一个 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 `capacity` 参数。This constructor is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is the `capacity` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建使用不同构造函数的哈希表 ，并演示哈希表行为中的差异，即使每个表包含相同的元素也是如此。The following code example creates hash tables using different constructors and demonstrates the differences in the behavior of the hash tables, even if each one contains the same elements. summary.span: 使用指定的初始容量、加载因子、哈希代码提供程序和比较器来初始化 类的新的空实例。

span.span: Initializes a new, empty instance of the class using the specified initial capacity, load factor, hash code provider, and comparer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过指定初始容量，无需在向对象添加元素时执行多个大小调整操作 。Specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the object. 根据负载因素，容量根据需要自动增加。Capacity is automatically increased as required based on the load factor. 加载因子是元素与存储桶的最大比率。The load factor is the maximum ratio of elements to buckets. 较小的负载系数意味着更快的查找，但代价是增加了内存消耗。A smaller load factor means faster lookup at the cost of increased memory consumption. 1.0 的负载因子是速度和大小之间的最佳平衡。A load factor of 1.0 is the best balance between speed and size. 当实际加载因子达到指定的负载因子时，存储桶的数量会自动增加到大于当前 bucket 数两倍的最小质数。When the actual load factor reaches the specified load factor, the number of buckets is automatically increased to the smallest prime number that is larger than twice the current number of buckets. 哈希代码提供程序密密麻麻中的键的哈希代码 。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 默认哈希代码提供程序是键的实现 。The default hash code provider is the key's implementation of . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 中的每个键都 必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique. 默认比较器是键的实现 。The default comparer is the key's implementation of . 自定义哈希代码提供程序和自定义比较器启用使用不区分大小写的字符串进行查找等情况。The custom hash code provider and the custom comparer enable scenarios such as doing lookups with case-insensitive strings. 此构造函数是一个 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 `capacity` 参数。This constructor is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is the `capacity` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建使用不同构造函数的哈希表 ，并演示哈希表行为中的差异，即使每个表包含相同的元素也是如此。The following code example creates hash tables using different constructors and demonstrates the differences in the behavior of the hash tables, even if each one contains the same elements. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ctorIntFloat#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ctorIntFloat/CPP/hashtable_ctorintfloat.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Hashtable_ctorIntFloat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ctorIntFloat/CS/hashtable_ctorintfloat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Hashtable_ctorIntFloat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Hashtable_ctorIntFloat/VB/hashtable_ctorintfloat.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键不能为 `null` ，但值可以为。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be. 通常不应将其状态与其哈希代码值之间的关联的对象用作键。An object that has no correlation between its state and its hash code value should typically not be used as the key. 例如，字符串对象比用于键的 StringBuilder 对象更好。For example, String objects are better than StringBuilder objects for use as keys. 你还可以使用 属性来添加新元素，方法是设置中不存在的键的值 ; 例如 `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue` 。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the ; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 但是，如果指定的键已存在于中 ，则设置 属性会覆盖旧值。However, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反， 方法不会修改现有元素。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 如果 小于的容量 ，则此方法为 `O(1)` 操作。If is less than the capacity of the , this method is an `O(1)` operation. 如果需要增加容量以容纳新元素，则此方法将成为一个 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 为 。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何向中添加元素 。The following example shows how to add elements to the . remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后，并 返回 `false` 。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对的后续调用 也将返回 `false` 。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用 返回 `false` ， 则未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 该枚举数不具有独占访问集合的权限；因此，枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法是一种 `O(1)` 操作。This method is an `O(1)` operation. 由于序列化和反序列化的枚举器 可能导致元素重新排序，因此不能在不调用方法的情况下继续枚举 。Because serializing and deserializing an enumerator for a can cause the elements to become reordered, it is not possible to continue enumeration without calling the method. ## Examples 下面的示例将和的用法与枚举的内容进行比较 `foreach` 。The following example compares the use of and `foreach` to enumerate the contents of a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合在创建之后不能再添加或移除元素，但是允许修改现有元素。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止添加和移除元素的包装;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，包括添加或删除元素，则固定大小的集合将反映这些更改。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值是一个 `O(1)` 运算。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以同时支持一个编写器和多个读取器。A can support one writer and multiple readers concurrently. 若要支持多个编写器，必须通过方法返回的包装完成所有操作 。To support multiple writers, all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the method. 枚举集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在 整个枚举过程中锁定集合：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/VB/remarks.vb#2)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何同步 ，确定 是否同步，以及是否使用同步的 。The following example shows how to synchronize a , determine if a is synchronized, and use a synchronized . [!code-cpp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此属性，可以使用以下语法来访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[key]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]`. 你还可以使用 属性来添加新元素，方法是设置中不存在的键的值 ; 例如 `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue` 。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the ; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 但是，如果指定的键已存在于中 ，则设置 属性会覆盖旧值。However, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反， 方法不会修改现有元素。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 键不能为 `null` ，但值可以为。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be. 若要区分 `null` 返回的，因为找不到指定的键，并且 `null` 因为指定的键的值为而返回，则 `null` 使用 方法或 方法来确定列表中是否存在该键。To distinguish between `null` that is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` that is returned because the value of the specified key is `null`, use the method or the method to determine if the key exists in the list. 检索此属性的值是一个 `O(1)` 操作; 设置属性也是一个 `O(1)` 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation; setting the property is also an `O(1)` operation. C # 语言使用 [`this`](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) 关键字来定义索引器，而不是实现 属性。The C# language uses the [`this`](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法对于多个读取器和编写器是线程安全的。The method is thread safe for multiple readers and writers. 而且，同步包装将确保一次只写入一个编写器。Furthermore, the synchronized wrapper ensures that there is only one writer writing at a time. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在 整个枚举过程中锁定集合：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 此方法是一种 `O(1)` 操作。This method is an `O(1)` operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何同步 ，确定 是否同步，以及是否使用同步的 。The following example shows how to synchronize a , determine if a is synchronized, and use a synchronized . remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建的同步版本 ，请使用 方法。To create a synchronized version of the , use the method. 但是，派生类可以使用属性提供自己的同步版本 。However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步代码必须对的执行操作 ，而不是直接在上执行操作 。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它与可能同时修改对象的其他线程保持正确的同步 。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 枚举集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在 整个枚举过程中锁定集合：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Hashtable.IsSynchronized Example/VB/remarks.vb#2)]

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.

returns.span: 可用于循环访问集合的 。

span.span: An that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置，调用会 引发异常。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后，并 返回 `false` 。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对的后续调用 也将返回 `false` 。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用 返回 `false` ，则调用会 引发异常。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合所做的更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举器可以失效，对或的下一个调用将 引发 。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator can be invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果在和之间修改集合 ，则 将返回它设置为的元素，即使枚举器已失效也是如此。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 该枚举数不具有独占访问集合的权限；因此，枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 此方法是一种 `O(1)` 操作。This method is an `O(1)` operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中值的顺序未 指定，但其顺序与方法返回的中的关联键的顺序相同 。The order of the values in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated keys in the returned by the method. 返回的不 是静态副本; 而是 指返回到原始中的值 。The returned is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the values in the original . 因此，对的更改将 继续反映在中 。Therefore, changes to the continue to be reflected in the . 检索此属性的值是一个 `O(1)` 运算。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation.
